label: 撥鏤
対訳語: A technique used to decorate ivory.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: First, the ivory is stained red or blue, then it is hairline-engraved, exposing white ivory in the design lines. These white lines might then be colored in with different dyes or pigments.
